place_description: Counter-serve bakery/cafe chain serving sandwiches, salads & more, known for its bread & free WiFi.

reviews_data.review_text: Had my order ready quick and they were busy. The pastry was dry, but it was good.
Wonderfully helpful employees  and a great atmosphere for a quick bite or a sitting down for A meal with your family.
I love their variety of tea.
Asiago bagel is good.   That's about it.

I ordered smoothies from the rock hill location on the way home from a trip to visit family in the mountains. When I tried ordering my smoothie today, I meant to order it at my local location in South Carolina, not the rock hill. I called the manager to let them know I wouldn't be picking it up and they could give it to one of their employees. The manager said she would happy to refund me, no questions asked. I was like WHAT?! It was my fault! And she was just like "we get it. It happens to people." I was so happy my money didn't go to waste. Just really appreciated their understanding.
What a wonderful lady at the Panera counter this morning.  So positive and happy.  As she said, let's start today great, the sun is out!

We had a great experience at this location. The lady who took our order was so pleasant and the lady who prepared our order was pleasant as well. Good food, great staff, we'll definitely go to this location again.
Wonderful place. I am here all the time

I order catering for my work events and it's always amazing with great customer service but havent personally ordered in a long time.  Tonight I did a rapid order as I was running errands and needed to grab something for dinner.  My sandwich was fabulous and just as I ordered with that extra cheese!  The staff was attentive and greeted me as soon as I came in.  I'll be back more often!
Came here to work remotely and found it quite enough and with enough space to spread out. Ordered lunch and food delicious
Great food, prepared to perfection, from smiling faces, and ready super fast!

Went with a group of wonderful friends after church it's was great.  We're all able to sit together by putting the tables together and my husband and me sat in a booth and all the kids sat at a booth but we were able to be close enough that we could talk and joke without bothering others . We had a wonderful time!
I was facing an issue with an order that I had placed and the manager (her name is either Marsha or Martha) was super helpful and very kind in helping me get it resolved! Amazing customer service.
Laid back cozy environment...can read a book,school work,computer work..has a fireplace
Excellent customer service and wonderful atmosphere.  Great food and coffee.

i am so disappointed with this location. i have been coming here for years never really had any issues. keep in mind i worked at the Panera Bread in FortMill for 2 years. anyway, the sandwich i get has no meat on it, its a very simple order. last night my whole sandwich was wrong, no spoon in the bag, and at the window when i told the workers thank you AFTER i had to wait 20 extra minutes on my online order that was running behind, they look at you like a deer in headlights when you talk to them. having worked in this restaurant before it's not a difficult job at all!!! get it together panera rockhill

I cannot say enough good things about this place. Every time I go I have a difficulty picking out what I want to eat cuz there are so many delicious things on the menu. When I leave I've eaten delicious food that also has a lot of good things about it. Love that they have so many great things for breakfast lunch and dinner and excited that my husband loves this place as much as I do.
Casey/Cassie was very rude. Did not give adequate assistance when resolving an issue with the food and the bathroom. Never had such a bad experience with Panera.

Your store is going downhill. They refused to warm up my chicken for my salad and tge lettuce was was brown.   The server also threw my baguette in tge bag like shr was shooting hoops.
Unbelievable!
I had the broccoli cheese soup and half a BLT which I thought were both very good.  My wife had the Mac and cheese with bacon and a grilled cheese sandwich which she did not care for.
Fantastic service, loved Marcia, super friendly!
ALWAYS OUT OF Cheddar Broccoli Soup!!
Can't go wrong with Panera!!
Combat veterans like myself can't even get 10% off on a bowl of broccoli cheddar soup I would never come to this place again you people are so sorry

Got a frontega chicken sandwich it had literally 1 Tbl spoon of chicken on it... i asked about it and he showed me the scoop. That was supposed to be on there, and it looked like three times the amount that I got. He literally said, oh I don't know, and that was it. No manager, and I think I had 3 huge pieces of cheese on there. It looked more like a grilled cheese sandwich than anything else. Also, the broccoli cheddar did not taste like it used to. So disappointing! $28 for 2 U pick 2's you think it would be better. I hate how they ask for a tip before you actually get your food... Can I get my to back?? Lol
If you would like to enjoy a helping of food poisoning or bowel issues, feel free to visit this location. By all means DO NOT purchase the broccoli cheddar, it will make you very sick.

As always, Panera bread did not disappoint me. Fresh bread, clean restaurant, happy staff. I love this place, any location I go to. Its a shame we don't have 1 in Gaffney or Shelby. This place always makes me happy!

Clean and well maintained location with a good variety of food.
As I donate plasma, I like having this location nearby so I can relax and replenish my system before moving onwards.
My salad was brown and I asked for a bread bowl they delivered a cup very disappointed with this location

Gave a two bc the sandwiches are bomb! But the manger Casey was disrespectful to me today. After being notified at the register that I have accumulated points for spending $$ there... I could get a free drink. Register employee said to me "your drinks will be ( over there ) " pointing at the food station. Patiently waiting 20 min , having to be the last one served in that little waiting que with others I politely asked Casey if that was my order , she was the one standing there at the station and had just finished my order.
Since  I only saw the pomegranate lemonade I had purchased... and not a cup for my earned rewards freebie

She said "That's all", I said well can I please get my free drink that I had rewards for as well and she looked at me funny : said nothing: I repeated .. then she reached out and grabbed the cup just holding it , instead of reaching out , providing it / saying I'm sorry  would be just too much .. but my problem is she proceeded to turn to a customer that had walked by to wait and laughed at me as I did not have a lid ( they are behind register) and had me put on a soup lid.

After being embarrassed.. and spending my lunch hour being disrespectful .. back to work I had to go, before leaving I spoke to her and she jokingly laughed and said well can I get you your lid for you now ...

All I asked was please don't disrespect any more customers today over a drink because it was rude and I felt hurt and shaking to a point of anxiety creeping in.

50$ ain't worth that with that type of service
Disrespectful.. in my professional opinion SHES NOT MANAGER MATERIAL.

Good luck and hope you all don't get disrespected when asking for your free drink cup by her

Thanks so much Casey, love wins
Oh and my soup lid worked extra good

Genius!

Wish you the best

Angelika
Great food, friendly staff and food was wonderful
Nice people
Really good food love the people employees and customers are all different than Florida people for sure food is the same quality so that good

Honestly I've always given praise where praise is due. Especially at this establishment that I love tremendously. Today as I was waiting for my food I witnessed an employee come from outside, walk into the kitchen (with no hat and hair down below her shoulders) where they were preparing my food, proceeded to let her hair fly as she spoke to the one making my order.  She didn't wash her hands, put on gloves, put her hair up or even clock in, but proceeded to handle my food and put it in the broiler.  I am appalled and thoroughly disappointed that the person this young lady was speaking to didn't correct her as she was the manager on duty. Please do better and think about your guests well being. I will not be back to this location.
Always good food. A bit pricey on certain things but great food and service.
Quick service, kind staff, and comfortable atmosphere ever since renovation. Love the citrus punch!

Just like a classic Panera bread. Only I was there in the evening so the baked goods selection was limited, but that's to be expected.tried something new, the Mediterranean greens and grains salad. Was very impressed!
The manager and crew are exceptionally kind.  ....eventhough I walked in minutes before closing.
Manager is 10/10! Had an issue with payment in an app and got it solved it 5 mins! Good service, food is always fresh and tasty!
Super. Fast, good, enjoying new menu items.
Great experience! Staff was attentive and food was delicious. Thank you!

I was kinda disappointed with Panera Bread this time.  The cashier was great.  The servers/ prep folks was very talkative, not paying attention to my question and also messed up my food.  This is the 1st time this has ever happened to me here.  I spent over 50 bucks. I had to go back and asked for my sandwich I ordered. The guy said oh I was wondering why this sandwich was here.  Now that pissed me off.  Then I get home I was supposed to have broccoli and cheese soup. This dude gave me vegetable noodle soup. Now what in the world was going on in the back. There was about 5 people standing around the counter. At least one of the 5 should've gotten my order right.  This is ridiculous and poor customer service for the inflated price I paid.  One disappointed customer.
One person preparing food.  My take out order was given to a dine in order.  I walked out with my sandwich 30 mins after it was supposed to be ready. Never going to the Rock Hill Panera again.

The lady at the cash register who was taking orders had gloves on she was handling people's cash. She turned around with those same gloves and was picking up pastries and arranging them on a tray! Money is one of the dirtiest things you can touch! So you are taking money and touching food with the same gloves? "WHY bother wearing the gloves at all?
Restful, polite and helpful. Nice atmosphere to work or spend with family, friends and bible study groups.

They said they were out of ranch dressing, but turned out they had some in to go cups.  Only in the 50s outside but AC is blasting.  Older gentleman wanted to seat by fireplace but no outlets so he brings his own extension cord.  Little of a trip hazard!  My Ranch Cobb only came with one slim slice of egg!  Come on people what does an egg cost $0.15 cents?  2 people pick 2 deals with water to drink $29.71!  Subway next building over!

I'm so disappointed with Panera getting rid of the quinoa bowls. No notice or anything. That was by far the best thing on their menu. They could've at least gave us a notice that they were getting rid of half of the menu! Never going to Panera again. Y'all make me sick.

Oh my!!! Was looking forward to a nice veggie meal option with bean soup or  veggie salad.. but no !!! They changed the menu yesterday and now they are mainly a salad place. Ordered French soup which was all brown and tasted like  beef bouillon. Don't remember French onion soup being all beefy. Their veggie sandwich had feta cheese, not an option for true  vegans..  . and sooooo messy. It wasn't busy at 3:30pm  UT ni one has cleaned any tables....oops here she comes 40 min. later to  clean....Sorry, I won't be back here or anywhere with this  new menu.!!!!

Panera takes no responsibility...
I typically order frequently from Panera through DoorDash. I never had a problem until today when they totally messed up my order. When I called them to complain, the manager said I had to take it up with DoorDash. DoorDash gave me a credit of $2.91 for a $23.00 order. One of the sandwiches was missing meat. They only gave me credit for the missing meat. I was like who is gonna eat sauce and cheese. Not me. Panera takes no responsibility for there error. I will think twice before I order from Panera again. Totally disappointed.

It's so dirty in this building and having to fix my own stuff once I order is absurd if I wanted to fix my own stuff I would have fixed it at home what's the point of ordering it at a restaurant to fix it. Only at this location do they do. I have the strip club and I've never had to do that at any other location... Ridiculous!!!
Our favorite place to sit, relax, and have a cup of coffee. Their soups and sandwiches are also good. A comfortable place to be.
Waited 15 minutes for a slushy.

It was the worst experience I've ever had at panera. Ordered thru mobile app a pizza and a sandwich.  Waited for 40 minutes to tell me that my order was not ready yet. Canceled and got my refund back. Never again to this location.
Love the tomato soup n grilled cheese on a cold n rainy day.
The people here are just the nicest people they're all smiling and very helpful with making a decision on what I wanted to try. Can y'all please bring Panera bread to York South Carolina?

I placed my order to go. I don't eat any sauces, so I order my sandwich plan along with my food. I must say my food was place, but I had maybe mustard or something all on the outside of my wrapped sandwich! It was also on the outside of my bag, so when I opened everything, I had mustard on my hands. That let me know that they didn't clean their hands after preparing someone else's food.
Panera, just okay.

I have been here on two occasions recently and they are the only Panera in the area that are willing to accommodate for my allergies. I drive about 35 minutes just to come to this Panera because of their service. Ever since the company got the new toasted french baguette sandwiches, most locations will not substitute other sandwich breads for the french baguette on normal sandwiches (not sure why?). I've always ordered the same thing for years because of my allergies: the bacon turkey bravo with french baguette instead of the tomato basil bread. The manager (who placed my order) was very nice and even wrapped my pager so there wouldn't be any cross contamination on that either. She made sure the cooks behind the counter knew about my allergies and made me feel like I was in safe hands.

Only downside I had about the experience was the lack of clean tables. Seemed like all the tables had crumbs on them; however, with how busy they were, it was to be expected.
Great food and customer service.
Food is good but on the expensive side.

The person taking my order seemed impatient & unfriendly. Bread bowl was molded, soup was good but Luke warm, my soup barely filled my bowl halfway. You get a Baggett & a bread bowl way too much bread. Panera should consider giving more soup less bread & ORGANIC ingredients for the price.

Came in and ordered 2 bowls of soup. While picking up my order from the window I was told " we are out of baguettes. Would u like an apple or a bag of chips." I specifically came here for the soup with the baguette. If I was told that when I ordered I would've just went somewhere else! I was even asked what side I wanted as is bagettes were on option. If I just wanted soup I could have picked some Campbells or Panera soup (they do sell it in store) at the grocery store and paid 1/3 of what I paid at Panera.
A little bit slow service, must to enroll more staff
Great conversation with the manager who took our order. Very friendly, traveling and glad we stopped in

Good food prepared while you wait.
Wait time was not long. Done with smiles on.
One of the old black lady managers was very rude... told me to get out of her way when I was waiting for my food.

Listen, today Marcia the manager of Panera at Manchester was phenomenal! Talking about service with a smile and a heart so big! Today my 2 teens and I were celebrating the fact that I won full custody of the one not biologically mine! Marcia celebrated with us! She gave us hugs and we all got to smile and share tears of joy for a most special day to us all! Everyone on the team today was friendly and kind, but I really wanted to shout out Marcia in particular because I needed someone else to share in one of my happiest moments! I don't have family here to celebrate with and that was what we needed a celebration of love! So thank you so much for making our day special and feeling the joy with us!

I like that you can order on a screen. I  was set on half a dozen bagels and a loaf of bread.  But they were out of everything I wanted. No cinnamon, everything, plain or asiago bagels, no cheese bread, no orange muffins. Nothing.What a let down.  I settled for a salad and one of the last blueberry muffins available. I hope my next visit is more fruitful.

just came here tonight for dinner and got a spicy chicken sandwich with broccoli cheddar soup, and a chocolate chip muffin, an apple and some mango lemonade for ONLY $20 this is the cheapest meal i've had in months not to mention how amazing the food was! definitely coming back here!

Panera, despite not being a local business, impressed with its delicious soup. However, the ordering experience left much to be desired, as the staff announcing orders came across as a bit overbearing. It felt like a self-serve setup with an unnecessary vocal component, which detracted from an otherwise decent visit.

Aren't flatbread suppose to be hot?  I usually go to Kingsley Panera bc the food is hotter bc whenever I try to go here, the food is not hot, especially the flatbread. Get the food right for paying customers.
Good food and wonderful staff.h
I come to this location often and the food is always prepared quick and well. My wife and I come here to get away from the bad and unhealthy meals that almost every other restaurant offers around it.
Awesome food and service.
Self ordering was fine after waiting in a slow line.  Green papaya lemonade is great!!
Had lunch here.  Ordered the 1/2 and 1/2.  Service was good; food tasted great, especially the broccoli Mac n' cheese.

Such a bummer.  I just had a really bad experience at a place I bring 10-12 people to every week.  I am part of the sip club too. Today I had an order delivered to my home and it was missing an item.  When we called we were told to call back. When we said no we were put on hold for over an hour and finally hung up.  You all just soured this fan. Very bad customer service!
Love the atmosphere and good food as well and mostly quick

I went to Panera today for lunch and it was a very bad experience. Over the years it has grown to be an uncomfortable environment. The food is good, but I did not love having to scavenger for a place to sit. Every table I looked at was sticky, or had trash all over the floor below it.
Really good food love the people they all work together never heard anyone yelling at anyone love that Florida is so much not like this

I took my granddaughter yesterday to Panera. I used to love to eat there. I got her  Mac and cheese and the portion was so small I could not believe it, it is also so expensive. I got the corn chowder soup and again hardly any soup in the bowl.  With 2 drinks it came to about 20.00. I may never go back.went back today August 2 2023, got greek salad it was terrible. My granddaughter got small Mac and cheese which amounted to a big spoon full. Outrageous prices. Spend your money somewhere else.

I was there on a Sunday after church getting my food to go. I waited for a long time. I went to check the pick up window for my order and it had been sitting there who's to say how Long! The guy said it had just came up, lies. My pizza was like warm. All to say check on your food constantly!! Do Better

I'm not for Panera Bread, not because they are bad by any means, the service was great also but it's the portion of food you receive. Myself, I eat like a fat kids like cake. I got a spicy chicken sandwich and it was damn good, but I coulda ate three of them to fill me up, but for a light lunch to not feel bloated, top tier. And the raspberry tea (I think) I got was delicious and flavorful.
Expensive for what you get.
Great sandwiches
Great variety
It changes the quality of food. One day it's extra mayo or onion and other days it missing everything. Manager is Awesome. (she needs a vacation.) Tables are the same dirty or not.
I'm apart of the sip club. Always stop by for a drink. Never any issues with getting anything.

Had to wait 10 minutes from an empty store. In fact, they had to brew coffee which took 15 minutes! Employees don't check the pots on a regular basis. We were told this by an older gentleman who stops there daily.
Sidewalk seating was love even though it faces parking g lot.
Nice atmosphere
The person taking our order was very friendly, food was delicious
Expensive but good
Staff was very helpful and friendly
Excellent food and service!
Love the layout of this Panera. Those dining are away from the sounds of those ordering. I wish Greensboro had this layout.

Don't order Asian chicken salad the salad doesn't have chicken in it at all. I got the 1/2 salad and sandwich deal paid $14 to get a sandwich and lettuce on the side. I called to complain and manager took my info supposedly going to issue a voucher and send it in mail but never got anything I will check my order before I pay from now on. Chicken salad is suppose to have CHICKEN.
Delicious meal & great customer service!

The service is hit or miss at this location. The staff have always been friendly but we regularly have had our orders made incorrectly or have to ask for missing items when we order to-go. The dining area definitely needs a good deep clean, doesn't seem like it's had one in awhile.
Friendly staff
We had the broccoli and cheese soup with bread. It was very good, I thoroughly enjoyed it.

Just so tired of coming all the way from york and them being out of their most popular soup and pastries. If you know that pecan braids and cream of chicken and wild rice is one of your top selling items. Why are you running out? There are customers that can't come right when the doors open. Today at 1:30 they are out of that soup. The past few months it's been this way and for what it cost to eat there, you should keep your top selling items in stock longer than a couple of hours. Not coming back it's a waste of gas to come for nothing. We didn't complete our order this time we left.
Casey and Marsha are the best. Would not return to this place without them.

The service in the food is very delicious and fresh have not complain about that the space is big, The only issue it is the bathroom, because he's very small bathroom for such a huge place. The building needs some maintenance and a deep cleaning.
Love the Orange Ginger Tea..very nice Employees.. Great Desserts.. Nikki at the Southpark location was Wonderful she made my Day.
The food was great and service was fast for lunch rush
Ordered pick 2 for rapid pick up. Was greeted at door and told where rapid pick up and drink fountain were. Great service.
Sat there for 35 min waiting on a small Mac and cheese. Asked for refund. I mean how  hard is it to pour something in a bowl and serve it.

The food is always very good here, it's just not exceptional. Which is why I give it 4*. You know what you're getting, the menu doesn't change from store to store. Definitely will return in the future for any meal of the day.
Ordered a soup and special bread but they didn't change it on the ticket,   I love panera so every thing is always great
The Butternut Squash soup is amazing.  I like everything I have ever gotten there to eat.  They are little pricey, but worth it.
Clean, hot food, great staff
This Panera has a Nice environment. Friendly Staff. I Enjoy going in and talking to the ladies for the many years I have I have been going there.

I have the unlimited beverage so I Order all the time with soup and sandwiches or salads every day for lunch. Food is delicious and very filling. Order on my app and pick up so easy especially lunch time. It's always crowded
Slow service, dining area could use a good cleaning.
Great customer and great food!

Really good salads. My favorite is the Green Goddess Cobb with chicken.  They don't really give enough dressing for the salad. The cups of dressing provided are small and filled halfway. The Mac-n-cheese is good to my grand baby but the portion size is ridiculously overpriced. A small is almost $7 and my 2-yr old wanted more after finishing it.
Not as good as it was . Food was ok , dining area was not cleaned up from previous customers .

Bagel was fine, but other half was missing....almost half of it? Was a bit strange. Panera is fine and their quality is ok, but uh....this was strange. It's not that I won't go back, but I might just prefer a mom and pop place more..

I came in early on a Monday morning and needed to order sandwiches for a broker open house. As Ashlyn started on my order, customers began pouring in. She was the only person taking orders at the time and remained professional,  poised, patient and as sweet as can be. She is a gem.

Excellent customer service delicious flatbread pizza delicious Mediterranean bowl veggie so good the Mediterranean bowl in my opinion was enough for two people as well as the flat bread pizza in fact I believe  It's enough for four
My food was spectacular but my daughter had a bad experience with her Caesar Salad.  Will stick with soup next time.

Sky was awesome! She went out of her way to make sure I had everything for my order regardless of how busy she was she went above and beyond. Plus the food was on time and great! Great customer service!

Today 10/15/2022, arrived at ( Panera Bread ) 526 John Ross Parkway  Rock Hill SC, after about 2 minutes service very good i purchase a cater order the young lady that assist me was wonderful and professional in all areas nice clean facility!
Very consistent. Love going to Panera.
They ALWAYS FORGET THE DRINKS! SO ANNOYING AND THEY DON'T CARE
Pizza was amazing!!
I had their Margarita flatbread. It was delicious, but very small. It had 6 small pieces. I shared it with Grandson but he wanted more. Next time I'll be alone & eat it all myself
Food is great but I miss the pecan twirls
Loved it!!!

Ordered via door dash. When order arrived, we received chicken noodle soup with no noodles or chicken, just plain broth. Also chicken and rice soup was missing. Sandwiches were messy. Definitely the worst experience we have had at this location. Would not recommend!
The place was dirty food was NOT good at all
Good food. Fast service.
Yummy best cheesy flat round bread.
Love the food and the service.
I was chilling  and Relaxing  the food is awesome
Great service and food. Management and cashier was very attentive.
Great food but the didn't have ranch for salad and I was kinda mad eating a plain salad.
"Rapid" pickup took 40min for a bowl of soup, they still got it wrong
I t was fine. I had the steak and cheese sandwich w pickled onions. Very tasty.  The cashier was very friendly.
This restaurant is amazing for there food and for there pastry! This is one of my favorite restaurants! I really recommend this place!
Acceptable!

100% agree with checking your order before you leave. I often come in for breakfast and order lunch to go for later. I've mentioned to management that forgetting barbecue sauce on the barbecue chicken sandwich is kind of a key component, and frustrating. They took the feedback and my next sandwich was fine. I recently ordered a steak and cheddar as well as a Greek salad to go after ordering breakfast. They forgot to add cheddar on the steak and cheddar, and yes the meat was skimpy, but I more care that the two ingredients IN THE NAME of the sandwich are included. The dressing cup was also not closed so by the time I got to eat the salad at work later that day everything was soaked. (I had trusted the order was correct and packaged with care, my mistake) I'm used to them regularly forgetting ingredients but they never make up for it or offer to redo it correctly. I hate ordering rapid pick up just have to unbox and unwrap things before I leave just to make sure.  I definitely won't pay for a premium sandwich there again. Sad really. Fortunately there's another Panera a couple miles up the interstate

Salad was great. The $13 Toasted steak and white cheddar sandwich was horrible. Meat was so so and not much at. Now I know why they Do Not Say -- WE HAVE THE MEAT.  They were out of pickled onions so substituted red onions. Anyway lesson learned will not eat there in future. Picture shown has a few bits out of lower piece. Sandwich had horseradish on outside of sandwich sort of looking like it was thrown together in a rush and somehow made its way to top of bread outer layer.
My tea tasted like mold...?????? And I didn't even receive my sandwich? It was just a grilled cheese
Their staff needs more training with online orders

So... You ask me if I would like my baguette or chips, I respond with baguette and don't receive it then... my brother gets your new chicken sandwich and it's cold. Like cold to the touch. We won't be returning. Thanks but no thanks.
Disappointed with hot chocolate. Over priced.
Expensive but good.  No lemon for our tea.
Super slow. Half the staff was on break. I was the only one there, does it take 20 minutes for a sandwich?  Employees trying to get their hands cut off in the bagel slicer. This place is a madhouse.

Marcia is an Awesome manager
She went above and beyond for every customer
Making sure nothing was left out of their to go bags.. I'm glad to see her take pride in her Job!!! All of the employees were kind and helpful
Keep it

Arrived around 9 on a weekday, and had to order through the kiosk. About 2/3 of their breakfast sandwiches had a "sold out" notification next to them, so nothing was being made fresh. Ended up just getting a bagel. Not real impressed with Panera these days.
Not bad but not as good as before Pandemic
Portions have decreased...soup tasted salty and bread was hard. But maybe it's supposed to be that way
Slow service tonight but still one of our favorites...

Placed order. Not told out of hibiscus plum tea and pear, which is what we ordered. Waited one hour and five minutes for order. Grill cheese not grilled. Chicken avocado sandwich had slightly frozen chicken and exactly one small slice of avocado. Never again.

Waited for over an hour before our order was ready. Other customers were having the same problem with their orders, waiting easily over an hour for their orders. Some even left frustrated after waiting so long and trying to get a refund.

Just looked at the comments and decided not to go here. Just because these times are difficult don't mean these restaurants have to show it on there faces. Thank God for life and thank God to have a Job.
I can't really say much except that it's a standard Panera. Food was fine,  service fine,  cleanliness fine.  Not much else I can say.
In and out quickly.  Picked up a hot chai tea latte .
It was just okay nothing to write home about
Its always Hands Do an, 1 of the best places in Hickory...to eat ever...always nice amount of servers to greet and feed you! Always loved their Cinnamon Crunch, or Asiago Bagels!
All was good

They advertise delivery. Website says delivery they charged me for delivery and driver tip. 30 minutes past delivery ETA I called the store and was told they don't deliver! My order for delivery is sitting there getting cold! The frustrating thing is they have delivered to me before!
Their breakfast sandwiches are delicious.
Nice place; unfortunately, they don't carry the kind of bread I prefer.
Always consistently good food, atmosphere and staff
Cashier's were nice as always, but it didn't smell clean walking in, the chairs were quite sticky, and the food wasn't as good as it usually is.
The pastas are delicious - price a little higher for small size.
I ordered a Caesar salad with chicken.  The lettuce was seriously wilted and brown. (About 1/3 of it).  I complained and got a new salad...it also had wilted lettuce! Yuck!
1st time here. It was very good. My gson & I enjoyed every bite.
Great atmosphere! Spacious and quiet enough to do our men's Bible study.
The counter lady was super nice and friendly.  Food was good. I had a roasted turkey avocado BLT.
The strawberry poppyseed salad is back. Nice and refreshing
Very slow service and food was mediocre.
Great food, customer service, consistent, love the atmosphere!
The staff is very friendly and we always enjoy the food.

It's just okay, there is nothing at this location in Rock Hill, SC, that says it's especially kind, nice, or even considerate.  If you are not a patron of the establishment and know how things work, NO ONE is kind or nice to let you know where things are or where to pick up your food once you've ordered.  I won't miss the food or the lack of friendliness of this establishment if I don't come back.
Strawberry poppyseed salad...so cool, fresh and delicious!
Food is pricey to portion size but almost everything is so good! Besides lunch I bought the kitchen sink cookie and that was awesome! Coffee not so good.
Has seen better days.
It was nice to dine out again and they did a good job of having separated tables and distancing still enforced. The food was as wonderful as I remember.

I had a code for a free flatbread pizza. It was issued in March and was not working. The manager ( I am assuming) went above and beyond. She put the code through. She was pleasant from the time I walked in until I left. My husband, brother-in-law and myself split the pizza. It was enough for each of us to have 2 pieces. It was AMAZING!!
Breakfast sandwich always on point. Their salads and pastries
Panera is the perfect eatery for an any time of the day meal.  The Rock Hill location is always quite busy, however the team members are efficient in handling the orders and always friendly.
I love my Goddess salad.
Delicious food with fast service.
Food is good, service is good.

Staff was super friendly and helpful.  Food was as expected.  They had the iced tea bar (my fav) and the fire place was going   Unfortatnely, covid changes caused confusion on where & how to pick up food.  We sat outside, since we had our corgi with us.
Very good food and sevicr

Have you ever thought to yourself "wow, I'm really hungry, so I want to order food. However, I want getting the food to be a challenge."? If you have, this place is for you. Not only will they lose your order several times, but you won't get your food for more or less two hours after you order it. You'll get some much needed quality parking lot time to yourself to rethink your decision, however you know you already paid for it so you have no other choice but to wait. Then, when you finally get your food, you'll think you're a champion, having conquered the Panera challenge and everything. Then you get home and realize they forgot half your food. Then you will know, you can't win when you order from Panera.

Are up for the challenge? Order today!
If I could give this location zero stars I would. They don't make the order per your request and the so called team manager is rude.
This location pretty regularly runs out of things. Apparently they only bake in the morning and even if they sell out early, they don't make more.
Always good food and service. Decent prices.
I love everything about this location! A must  when you are in Rockhill South Carolina
Friendly service!
Excellent service and delicious food.
Great Tuesday Special for Bagels at half price.
Great service.

I ordered a large coffee and a breakfast sandwich. The half and half was empty and the coffee was as well. You have to ask for sugar. It was unclear where to wait for your food. I ended up leaving without my food and someone finally brought it out to me this place is poorly managed
Amazing
Terrible staff, very rude...super slow as well
Terrible service from rapid pickup through DoorDash. Will not be doing business with this location anymore.
I love their food!

Very fresh and delicious!! Deb processed our order very accurately, and packaged it neatly. I definitely recommend Panera, Rock Hill for takeout; ask for Deb, she does a great job with individual orders and catering! We will be ordering from there again soon!

The service was terrible! I had a curbside pick up, I arrived on time, and said I was here at the time they said it will be done,  my order was suppose to be done at 5:02 pm. I waited  20 mins before I went and inside to figure out what was going on with my order. I walked up to the women at the front and asked when  my curbside pick up order will be done. She just looked at me and pointed at an order that was not mine " and said is that yours?" I said no. She finally moved from behind the counter and asked me for  my name. Which should have done in the first place. Instead of just pointing at a random order and guessing. My order was done  it was just sitting on a shelf for who knows how long . She just handed to me and didn't even apologize to me for my wait. I feel like if I wanted to go inside to get my order I would have done that the first time.  I will never again come to the Rock hill Panera Bread. The hot chocolate was also nasty.
Clean location
Fantastic service

Downhill slide of food quality and customer service may have leveled off. Recent addition of flatbread pizza their first winner after dropping many good menu items the past year or so. Hoping for a new and better Panera going forward.

I had a chicken salad sandwich this Tuesday. It was terrible. I have had this before,but it was very different this time. There was more lettuce than chicken salad,and the tomatoes were wilted. Things are different!
A good place.  This Panera always cuts through the riff-raff and serves me better than I sometimes might deserve.  They seem to practice the "customer first" idea.  Remember that?
The Dave Lyle location must have just been having a bad day
Double check your order before leaving, they didn't include my side or my pastry and they don't answer the phone
Their covid set up is unorganized and anxiety provoking. Not a single friendly face and coffee was less than stellar.
Their service curbside was very fast and courteous. If in the neighborhood I would definitely stop by again.
The staff isn't friendly or attentive to there job. Seem very prejudice when I tried to order and unwittingly to help me.
How does Panera Bread run out of bread they also had no broccoli cheddar soup
Using Online Ordering, No Broccoli Cheddar or French Onion along with others soups.
What is the purpose of curbside pickup if you're not gonna bring me my food. Should not have to call the store & sit on hold for 15 minutes to find my order

Have patronized this store many times during the pandemic trying to do my part to keep our restaurants open.  Today may be the last time for this Panera.  They shorted my curbside pickup order, and I've been trying to call them repeatedly for 2 hours to report it and get compensated.  No one answers the phone.  Sorry, but when business is bad, it's foolish to cut customer service.

Two days in a row in a row I've ordered here and they completely missed items on my order. Then when I called to speak with a manager, nobody answers and it just rings to nothing. I called FOUR times!TERRIBLE customer service!

Ok. It's the same as pretty much every other Panera. Closed down their soups early so they could close on time (8pm). So you get a "modified" menu if it's close to closing time. I get it... but at the same time it's annoying. Post some signs or put it on your website. "After 7pm you can only get these items". That way I know to go someplace else after 7pm. Better yet... just close down at 7pm and spend the last hour cleaning before you cut out at 8pm.
Food was great and service as well.
Repeat bad service. Mistakes filling orders. Will be a long time before I try this place again. All other Panera Bread locations have been much better.

Ordered early morning for a late lunch-time meal, and still had to wait an extra half hour for my order to be ready. I parked in the pick-up lane and was told someone would bring my order out to me; but after 30 minutes and 6 unanswered calls to the restaurant, I was still waiting. I had to call their national hot line for someone to get in touch with the store and bring my order out. And of course it was wrong. This is just the latest in a long string of screw-ups I've experienced at various Panera stores. I don't think I will order from them any more, even though I like the food.

It was ok until I went to get my food there was a young white female with a very sweet young white male he was attentive to our needs she seemed as though we were bothering her. The food was ok the soup was cold and it was french onion soup ( not good) but sandwich was delicious

Your COVID procedures are over the top, no wonder the place was empty. I don't want some person wearing gloves that have touched everybody's order to go make me coffee way back in the back somewhere and make it in a way I don't like. I come to Panera to fix my own dman coffee. And for you NOT to touch it. You touching my coffee with your glove hands all over the lid and stuff is gross! It's worse! Let me fix my own coffee without you touching it. Y'all have just gone stupid.

The worst thing is placing your order and then getting home and realizing you are missing part of your order especially when it is a kid's meal. They don't understand when they have no lunch because someone didn't check an order. When you are primarily doing take out, you might want to make sure you take the time to check the orders before you send people home with them.
Love Panera! Relaxed atmosphere and great place to meet with people.
Fast and friendly even in the midst of the pandemic
Iced coffee and iced chai latte, so refreshing after a morning in the sun!
Marcia Barber was extremely friendly and helpful. I wish this Panera was closer to where I lived. Excellent all around. Thank you.

I ordered and picked up to go...mind you I live 30 minutes away. Got home and no soup! So disappointed. I called 3 times , no one answered and it was before 8pm. Not sure I want to drive there again but if I do....I will have it checked before I leave. 40 dollars worth but sure wasnt happy without my broccoli soup.
Meh

Be aware that if you order rapid curbside pickup they will not bring your food to your car. I waited almost ten minutes in my car and called the restaurant before I finally had to go inside and get it myself.

We ordered two salads and two half sandwiches for dine in.  When our order was ready, I picked it up and brought it to the table.  No utensils or napkins.  Went back to the counter to ask for napkins and utensils and got treated like I had committed a crime.  Will never go back and that was our first time ever eating at Panera Bread.
They were very nice and were doing the very best with all this craziness going on!
Amazing
Excelente!!
Soup was lukewarm, slow cashier service- not knowledgeable
Love this place food & service always good

I placed an order for delivery today to be delivered to me at work. I have ordered from this location before and never had this problem. Today I get the notification that my food is on the way and nobody shows up. It takes me calling the location 5 times to get someone to answer the phone, to be told that they use an outside delivery company Door Dash and all they want to do is cancel my order. I told them that I want my order. Never got my food. Only an order cancellation notice. Maybe Panera Bread should hire their own drivers or get a different delivery company. Never going to order food from this business for delivery ever again.
Typical Panera. Good food
Online ordering was efficient. Had to wait longer than anticipated, but enjoyed the meal and all was well.
Meal was hot and delicious.
Food is fresh and excellent service is friendly
Tasty as always
Phenomenal customer service!
if you have never paid 14 bucks for a meal and still be hungry....you gotta try it
Great customer service  and great food of course!
